title: [Large-scale] Collaborative Context-based Activity Learning for Mobile Learning Integration Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Core social science theories, practical experience, and basic mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: A short-term course for current professionals focusing on adapting to smartphone-based learning environments and strengthening mobile learning design capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can design 3 situation-based projects using Mobile Reusable Learning Objects (MRLOs)
Improve mobile learning activity scenarios by incorporating peer feedback in a collaborative learning environment
Analyze teacher efficacy (mTSES) measurement items when applying mobile learning and develop a self-efficacy improvement plan

resources: Mobile Learning Management Platform (e.g., Moodle Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
